determine whether an argument is any good.



Moral Reasoning
Many acts—such as lying to a friend—are not illegal, but they still seem immoral.
Thus, even if such an act is legallypermitted, this does not show that it is morally
permitted. That is a separate issue, and it is one that many people care deeply about,
because they want to do what is moral and avoid doing what is immoral. But how can
we show that an act is moral or immoral? On
